        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A216428/b216428.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..26</a>"
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(1) = 2^(1 - 1)*(1 + 1)^2 - (-1)^1 = 5.",
        "a(2) = 2^(2 - 1)*(2 + 1)^2 - (-1)^2 = 17.",
        "a(3) = 2^(4 - 1)*(4 + 1)^2 - (-1)^4 = 199.",
        "a(4) = 2^(5 - 1)*(5 + 1)^2 - (-1)^5 = 577."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[2^(n - 1) (n + 1)^2 - (-1)^n, {n, 300}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 10 2012 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: n in [1..100] | IsPrime(a) where a is 2^(n-1)*(n+1)^2 - (-1)^n]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 10 2012"
    ],

        "Cf. A216362."
